RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PARTY SWAGGER stalked the pace engaging on the far turn dueling inside of rival down the lane proving up to the task. SUFFICE advanced on the backside rallying to put a head in front on the far turn dueling abreast rival through the lane being out gamed late. REINA DEL BALI set the early pace weakening into the far turn racing evenly down the lane holding off the others. TEQUILA EMPIRE failed to respond. ALHAAN was never involved. FRANCIA (PER) pressed the pace through the backside giving way on the far turn. LADY EMPIRE stumbled entering the first turn losing the rider. THE STEWARDS CONDUCTED AN INQUIRY INTOT HE INCIDENT ON THE FIRST TURN AND TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Reina Del Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, weakened far turn, evenly to hold others

ENTRY.NAME: Party Swagger
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, engaged far turn, dueled inside of foe, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Francia (PER)
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Alhaan
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled, lost jockey, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Suffice
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, short lead turn, dueled abreast lane, held off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 12400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 27 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIDING THE BRICK pressed the pace through the turn ceding a clear lead to rival racing five wide into upper stretch coming again late to clear in the final yards. PITCH DARK pressed a short lead through the turn shaking clear from the rail in upper stretch becoming leg weary when run down late. GOTTAGETITBACK veered in brushing at the break lagging through the turn, rallied from the inside down the lane finding best action after the fact. EQUAL JUSTICE chased close up through the turn extending in the four path down the lane hanging late. BLOODPROF was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Equal Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased through the turn, extended lane, hung,

ENTRY.NAME: Bloodprof
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Gottagetitback
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed break, lagged turn, rallied inside lane

ENTRY.NAME: Pitch Dark
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed ahort lead, shook clear inside lane, leg weary late

ENTRY.NAME: Hiding the Brick
ENTRY.OWNER: Gray Christopher L and Gray Melissa R
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, ceded at mid track top lane, came again late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1 1/4M Dirt CR: 80. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-Winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 27 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023). (If necessary will be run ONE MILE AND ONE-QUARTER Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKY JUNIOR stalked the pace wresting the lead on the far turn shaking clear along the inside in upper stretch widening under urging. CLASSIC FILM set the pace ceding on the far tun angling off the inside in upper stretch coming again late to save place. BRIAR JUMPER prompted the pace pressing through the far turn chasing down the lane coming up a touch short. TODAY MATTERS raced evenly throughout finishing along the rail. SUPPLY CHAIN advanced on the backside threatening through the far turn weakening in upper stretch. GENERAL DIRECTION stalked the early pace fading on the far turn. FARM STRONG struggled well back.

ENTRY.NAME: General Direction
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, faded far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Film
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ceded far turn, regrouped late for place

ENTRY.NAME: Supply Chain
ENTRY.OWNER: Bernardini Jay P Burnsworth Richard and Buyea Kristina
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, chased far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Today Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, saved ground to lane,

ENTRY.NAME: Briar Jumper
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, pressed far turn, chased lane, bit short

ENTRY.NAME: Farm Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: struggled well back

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Junior
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, led far turn, drew away inside lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 27, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAVI away alertly set the pace holding daylight through the turn widening a bit down the lane under urging. CAPTAIN ANNE went evenly through the turn extending into upper stretch finding a late move to get up for place. BISCOTTINI slow early gained on the turn bidding four wide down the lane hanging late. DONYA'S MAGIC chased the pace through the turn weakening on the inside down the lane. KENNEDIE SKY trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Anne
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, extended to lane, late move saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Mavi
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, widened driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Biscottini
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally turn, 4 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Donya's Magic
ENTRY.OWNER: Staley Terry and Lugovich Charles F
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened inside

ENTRY.NAME: Kennedie Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 27 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KAZTHAROS hustled outside on the turn extending past mid track in upper stretch surging late three deep getting up at the wire. BORN FOR VICTORY pressed the pace shaking clear in upper stretch digging in late being grabbed from the outside in the final strides. HARD FROST pressed in pursuit on the turn chasing in upper stretch surging late between horses to be right there. FROSTED WHITE FACE dropped off on the turn racing evenly through the stretch. IN THE GOSPEL chased through the turn tiring along the rail the final eighth. ELUSIVE MOTION pressured the pace through the turn wearing out in upper stretch. CUPID'S NUMBER was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: In the Gospel
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, tired on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Frosted White Face
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped off on turn, evenly lane

ENTRY.NAME: Cupid's Number
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Born for Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, shook clear top lane, dug in late, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Elusive Motion
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, wilted lane

ENTRY.NAME: Kaztharos
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled up turn, surged late three deep, up at wire

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Frost
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed up on turn, chased lane, surged late between foes

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1 3/16M Dirt CR: 77. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-Winners Of a Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 27 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races Fo r $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PETTIGO GIRL prompted the pace vying between horses in upper stretch shaking clear gamely late. CARLIE Q BLUE pressed a short lead saving ground to upper stretch extending on the rail ceding late. WOLF EYES tracked dueling leaders rallying to vied three in upper stretch extending late being outfinished. VINTAGE SPARKLE raced evenly posing no threat. HONEY BOURBON was never involved. CHORIST played no factor. PANGEA was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Pangea
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Honey Bourbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Chorist
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Vintage Sparkle
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Carlie Q Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on lead, saved ground to lane, ceded on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Wolf Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, rallied into lane, vied three deep, outfnished

ENTRY.NAME: Pettigo Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, vied between top lane, cleared gamely,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Patrick Hayes & Pauric Lawler

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 27 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claimin g Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIZZEN rushed up to wrest the lead on the turn clearing past mid track in upper stretch holding safe under a drive. MISS SHADY slow early gave a wide burst near mid track in upper stretch angling in late. LUCKBEALADYTONIGHT chased on the turn extending four wide in upper stretch wavering a bit late with an even finish. ICE FLOE led early ceding on the turn weakening the final eighth. MACHTENHAIRONFIRE pressed early ceding on the turn fading through the lane. SOPRISE ASTRAY was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Floe
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, passed on the turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Luckbealadytonight
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased on turn, extended 4 wide lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Machtenhaironfire
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Soprise Astray
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Shady
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide burst mid stretch, angled in late

ENTRY.NAME: Mizzen
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up to lead turn, cleared mid track lane, held driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 27 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOCKO ROAD went evenly through the turn gaining in upper stretch surging up abreast rival at the wire. OFFUTT COLE pressed the pace dueling through the turn digging in with a short lead down the lane being grabbed in the last stride. AS DE ORO COCO slow early lagged on the turn angling out in upper stretch enteering the picture while in close late. THREE MILE LIMIT pressed the pace dueling through the turn into upper stretch coming up a bit short late. EL CARDINAL raced evenly playing no factor. WISE KHOZAN hopped missing the break. WILD RIVER WOLF gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Wild River Wolf
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Wise Khozan
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped missed break

ENTRY.NAME: Three Mile Limit
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled into upper stretch bit short

ENTRY.NAME: El Cardinal
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Offutt Cole
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on turn, dug in with short lead, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Jocko Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, gained upper stretch, surged late, up abreast foe

ENTRY.NAME: As de Oro Coco
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, angled out late, gained in close
